ing: 1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
des: "A super quick and easy recipe that's healthy and refreshing. I usually love customizing recipes I find and healthifying it whenever I can, and I especially love to play with milkshakes. I hope you will enjoy this!"
ins: Blend rice milk, carrot, ice cubes, honey, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth, at least 45 seconds. Strain milkshake through a fine-mesh strainer into a cup 2 times to catch any carrot lumps.
